errors.name: BadRequest
errors.explanation: The request could not be understood due to malformed syntax.

errors.name: Forbidden
errors.explanation: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it.

errors.name: NotFound
errors.explanation: The server has not found anything matching the request.
causes: The outbound call was made to an invalid phone number.
The TwiML application sid is missing a Voice URL.
solutions: Ensure the phone number dialed is valid.
Ensure the TwiML application is configured correctly with a Voice URL link.

errors.name: RequestTimeout
errors.explanation: A request timeout occurred.

errors.name: Conflict
errors.explanation: The request could not be processed because of a conflict in the current state of the resource. Another request may be in progress.

errors.name: UpgradeRequired
errors.explanation: This error is raised when an HTTP 426 response is received. The reason for this is most likely because of an incompatible TLS version. To mitigate this, you may need to upgrade the OS or download a more recent version of the SDK.

errors.name: TooManyRequests
errors.explanation: Too many requests were sent in a given amount of time.

errors.name: TemporarilyUnavailable
errors.explanation: The callee is currently unavailable.

errors.name: CallTransactionDoesNotExist
errors.explanation: The call no longer exists.

errors.name: AddressIncomplete
errors.explanation: The provided phone number is malformed.
causes: The outbound call was made with a phone number that has an invalid format.
solutions: Ensure the phone number dialed is formatted correctly.

errors.name: BusyHere
errors.explanation: The callee is busy.

errors.name: RequestTerminated
errors.explanation: The request has terminated as a result of a bye or cancel.

errors.name: InternalServerError
errors.explanation: The server could not fulfill the request due to some unexpected condition.

errors.name: BadGateway
errors.explanation: The server is acting as a gateway or proxy, and received an invalid response from a downstream server while attempting to fulfill the request.

errors.name: ServiceUnavailable
errors.explanation: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

errors.name: GatewayTimeout
errors.explanation: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, did not receive a timely response from an upstream server.

errors.name: DNSResolutionError
errors.explanation: Could not connect to the server.

errors.name: BusyEverywhere
errors.explanation: All possible destinations are busy.

errors.name: Decline
errors.explanation: The callee does not wish to participate in the call.

errors.name: DoesNotExistAnywhere
errors.explanation: The requested callee does not exist anywhere.
